title: Smartphone-Based LMS Utilization Strategies for Sustainable Corporate Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital device usage and workplace communication skills in basic language
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments utilizing smartphones for medical/legal/technical professionals to improve workplace language proficiency

learning_goals: Learners can voluntarily access language learning content at least twice weekly via LMS and achieve 80% or more of learning objectives
Learners can perform feedback-based collaborative learning activities with peer learners at least once weekly using collaboration tools
Learners can identify individual learning patterns based on learning analytics data and establish the next learning plan with 70% or higher accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
